Package com.automatak.dnp3

A package for all of the interfaces and pure java classes used in the opendnp3 java bindings.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Channel
    A communication channel to which DNP3 masters / outstation can be attached
    CommandHandler
    Outstation application code implements this interface to handle command requests from a master
    CommandProcessor
    Interface for dispatching command requests from a master to an outstation
    DataObserver
    Interface called to load data into an outstation or receive data from a master start() / end() must be called before / after any calls to update.
    DNP3Manager
    The main entry point for all dnp3 applications.
    ListenableFuture<T>
    Represents the future result of asynchronous operation.
    ListenableFuture.CompletionListener<T>
    A 'callback' that is registered via addListener and invoked when the operation completes.
    LogEntry
    A logged event
    LogSubscriber
    Interface used to bind to a stream of log messages
    Master
    Interface representing a master station
    Measurement
    Represents all measurements have a quality bit-field and a timestamp
    Outstation
    Interface representing an outstation
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AnalogInput
    A discrete or continuous analog value
    AnalogOutputDouble64
    A set-point command request with double precision floating point representation.
    AnalogOutputFloat32
    A set-point command request with single precision floating point representation.
    AnalogOutputInt16
    A set-point command request with short integer representation.
    AnalogOutputInt32
    A set-point command request with short integer representation.
    AnalogOutputStatus
    Represents the status of analog output on an outstation.
    AppLayerConfig
    Configuration object for the application layer
    BaseMeasurement
    Base class for all measurements that provides time and quality bit-fields
    BinaryInput
    A boolean measurement type (i.e.
    BinaryOutputStatus
    Represents the state of a digital output
    ControlRelayOutputBlock
    Command request for control a relay output
    Counter
    An increasing count of some event
    DatabaseConfig
    Configuration class for the outstation database
    DeadbandPointRecord
    Database point record for an type that can have an event class assigned and a deadband assigned
    EventPointRecord
    Database point record for an type that can have an event class assigned
    ExceptionScan
    Defines a periodic class based scan (Class 0,1,2,3)
    GroupVariation
    Defines a dnp3 group / variation pair.
    LinkLayerConfig
    Configuration class for the link layer
    MasterConfig
    Configuration class for a master station
    MasterStackConfig
    Highest level configuration class for a master stack
    OutstationConfig
    Configuration class that controls how an outstation behaves
    OutstationStackConfig  
    PointRecord
    Base class for all database point records
    SerialSettings
    Settings class uses to configure a serial port
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    AnalogInputQuality
    Quality enumeration for analog values
    AnalogOutputStatusQuality
    Quality enumeration for AnalogOutputStatusValues
    BinaryInputQuality
    Quality enumeration for BinaryInput values
    BinaryOutputStatusQuality
    Quality enumeration for BinaryOutputStatus values
    CommandStatus
    Enumeration that represents that result of command operation on an outstation
    ControlCode
    Enumeration that defines how a ControlRelayOutputBlock behaves
    CounterInputQuality
    Quality enumeration for counters
    FlowControl  
    LogLevel
    Enumeration for log severity
    Parity
    Serial port parity enumeration
    PointClass
    Enumeration for controlling class based scanning / eventing CLASS 0 corresponds to Group 60 Variation 1 CLASS 1 corresponds to Group 60 Variation 2 CLASS 2 corresponds to Group 60 Variation 3 CLASS 3 corresponds to Group 60 Variation 4
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    DNP3ConfigException
    Exception class thrown from DNP3Manager, Channel, etc in response to bad config

Package com.automatak.dnp3 Description

A package for all of the interfaces and pure java classes used in the opendnp3 java bindings. The root interface is DNP3Manager and is the starting point of all applications. You need the opendnp3-bindings jar with the package com.automatak.dnp3.impl package to obtain a concrete reference to a DNP3Manager, i.e. : 
 DNP3Manager manager = DNP3ManagerFactory.createManager(Runtime.getRuntime().availableProcessors());
